message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product.  Given its value and quality, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I really like the product, but I have a budget constraint and I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $14,500 is already a competitive price for this product. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,500. That's the lowest I can go.
